verbs.description: as [ARG1: flu season] [V: begins] [C-ARG1: parents still skeptical about effectiveness of vaccine] a survey shows more than half of parents with children under age 18 believe that their child can get the flu from the flu shot while a third think that the shot does not protect against the flu influenza flu vaccine flu flu season vaccine
